metadata.description: All adventure, all action, for all ages!  Join Mr. Fantastic, the Invisible Woman, the Human Torch and the Thing for a wild ride of all-new, unforgettable exploits.  When the world-renowned heroes happen upon some children in distress, they naturally rush to the rescue!  But not everything is as it seems, and the Fantastic Four are in for much more than they bargained for.
metadata.name: Marvel Adventures Fantastic Four
